Card.cardDescription:
Title: Young and Worthy Lord
Health/Gender:4M
Ability:
Balance of Power: Once during your main phase, you may discard any number of cards from your hand and equipment zone; then draw that same amount of cards.
Rescue: (Emperor Ability) Whenever you are on the brink of death and a WU faction hero uses a PEACH on you, you gain 2 health instead of 1.

Title: Young Conqueror of Jiangdong
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Ardor: Whenever you target a hero with a DUEL or RED ATTACK (vice versa), you may draw a card.
Soul Aura: (Awakening Ability) At the beginning of your turtn, if you have exactly 1 health, reduce your maximum health by 1 unit, then gain the [DASHING HERO] and [BRAVE SPIRIT] abilities. Your hand size limit is now equal to the amount of your maxium health.
Hegemony: (Emperor Ability) Once during each other WU faction hero's main phase, that hero may choose to clash with you. If that hero did not win, you can take the 2 cards reveal for the clash into your hand. If you have triggered [SOUL AURA], you may refuse these clashes.
[Dashing Hero]: During your drawing phase, draw an additional card.
[Brave Sprit]: At the beginning of your turn, if you are damaged, you may have another target hero choose one of the following: 1. Target hero draws X cards, then discards 1 card from their hand or equipment zone. 2. Target hero raws 1 card, then discards X cards from their hand or equipment zone. (X is your amount of missing health)

Title: The Emperor Who Tries to Save the Country
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Hostile Banquet: Once during your main phase, you may choose another target hero to choose one of the following: 1. Target hero discards a card. 2. Target hero gives you all their equipment cards from their equipment zone, and then you lose [HOSTILE BANQUET] ability for the rest of the game.
Vitalizing Education: At the end of your turn, you may target X heroes. Each target hero in sequence draws a card and then puts a card on top of the library from their hand or equipment zone. (X is your current health. If you have lost [HOSTILE BANQUET], X is your max health.)
Bound by orders: (Emperor Ability) Heroes within your physical range are treated as within the attack range of other WU faction heroes.

Title: The Pirate with Silk Sails
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Surprise Raid: During your main phase, you may play any BLACK cards in your hand and equipment zone as a BURN BRIDGES.

Title: Crossing the River in White Robes
Health/Gender:4M
Ability:
Self-Restraint: If you did not play or discard any ATTACK during your main phase, you may skip your discard phase.

Title: Sacrificing for the Country
Health/Gender:4M
Ability:
Sacrificial Injury: During your main phase, you may lose 1 life to draw 2 cards.

Title: Wu Viceroy
Health/Gender:3M
Ability:
Dashing Hero: During your drawing phase, draw an additional card.
Sow Discord: Once during your main phase, you may target another hero. That hero announces a suit, then takes one card from your hand and reveals it. If the revealed card is different from the anounced suit, you deal one damage to that hero. Then that hero takes the revealed card into their hand.

Title: The Reserved Beauty
Health/Gender:3F
Ability:
National Beauty: During your main phase, you may use your DIAMOND suited cards as ACEDIA.
Displace: Whenever you are the target of an ATTACK, you may discard a card from your hand or equipment zone; then choose another target hero other the attacker within your attack range, that hero becomes the new target of the ATTACK.

Title: The Meek Scholar with Valiant Talents
Health/Gender:3M
Ability:
Humility: You cannot be the target of PILFER and ACEDIA cards.
One after another: Whenever you have no cards in your hand, you may draw a card.

Title: Archery Princess
Health/Gender:3F
Ability:
Marriage: Once During your main phase, you may discard 2 cards and choose a target male hero; if you do, you and that hero gain 1 health.
Warrior Princess: Whenever a card is removed from your equipment zone, draw 2 cards.

Title: The Unconventional Beauty
Health/Gender:3F
Ability:
Heavenly Scent: Whenever you are dealt damage, you may discard a HEART suited card from your hand; then choose another target hero, that hero receives the amount of damage instead and draws a card for each damage recieved.
Youthful Beauty: (Passive) Your Spade cards in your hand and equipment zone and judgement result cards are considered as Heart cards instead.

Title: Battle Records in Scars
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Undying: Whenever you are on the brink of death, reveal a card from the top of the library; then if there are no [WOUND] cards with same rank attached to you, you gain 1 health and attach the revealed card as a [WOUND] onto your hero card as [WOUND]. If there is a [WOUND] card with the same rank as your revealed card, discard the revealed card into the graveyard and return to resolving your brink of death phase. If you have any [WOUND] cards attached to your hero, your hand size limit is equal to the number of [WOUND] cards attached to your hero.
Inspire: Whenever a hero discards a card or has a card taken by another hero, you may lose 1 life. If you do, the hero that discarded cards draws 2 cards.

Title: Ardent and Loyal Warrior
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Righteousness: Once during your main phase, you may clash with another target hero. If you win, you may use an additional ATTACK; until the end of your turn, your ATTACK cards may target an additional hero and ignore all range requirements. If you did not win, you cannot play ATTACK cards until the end of turn.

Title: Martial Emperor of Unyielding
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Brave Sprit: At the beginning of your turn, if you are damaged, you may have another target hero choose one of the following: 1. Target hero draws X cards, then discards 1 card from their hand or equipment zone. 2. Target hero raws 1 card, then discards X cards from their hand or equipment zone. (X is your missing health)

Title: The Maverick Diplomat
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Altruism: During your drawing phase, you may draw 2 additional cards; then if the number of cards in your hand is greater than 5, give half of the cards (rounded down) to another target hero with the least number of cards in their hand.
Alliance: Once during your main phase, you may choose 2 target heroes and discard X cards from you hand or equipment zone (X is the difference between the number of cards in both targeted hero's hand). If you do, those heros exchange the cards in their hand.

Title: Genius Prime Ministers
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Blunt Advice: During your main phase, you may play an equipment card onto another hero's equipment zone, then draw 1 card. (You cannot replace a equipment from an occupied slot)
Solid Governance: At the end of each other hero's discard phase, you may put 1 card discarded by that hero during their discard phase back into their hand, then take the other discarded cards into your hand.

Title: Forthright and Courageous
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Whirlwind: Whenever you discard at least 2 cards during your discard phase; or you lose a card in your equipment zone, you may choose up to 2 target heroes and discard up to 2 cards from their hand or equipment zone.

Title: Martial Empress of Unyielding
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Amrita: Once during your main phase, you may choose 2 target heroes with equipment in their equipment zone, if the difference between the number of equipments is less than or equal to X, exchange their equipment. (X is your missing health)
Ameliorate: When a hero is on the brink of death, you may reveal a card from that hero's hand, if the revealed card is a non-basic card, discard it and that hero gains 1 health.

Title: The Steel Barricade of Jiang Dong
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Breakthrough: Whenever you play an ATTACK targeting a hero, you may take X cards from his hand or equipment zone and set them aside facing down. (X is his current health) Return those cards to that hero's hand at the end of your turn.

Title: The Uncrowned Queen
Health/Gender:3F
Ability:
Pacify: Once during your main phase, you may choose 2 target heroes with a different number of cards in their hand, the hero with the least amount cards in their hand takes a card from the hero with the higher amount of cards in their hand and reveals it. If the suit of the revealed card is not a SPADE suit, you draw a card.
Reminiscence: When you are dead, you may choose a target hero other than the killer, that hero draws 3 cards and gains 1 health.

Title: Loyalist of Three Generations
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Plague Fire: Whenever you use a NORMAL ATTACK, you may treat it as a fire ATTACK. If this ATTACK deals damage, you lose 1 health. Your fire ATTACKs may target an additional hero.
Superior Vintage: At the end of your turn, if you have no [VINTAGE] attached to your hero card, you may attach any number of ATTACK cards onto your hero as [VINTAGE]. Whenever a hero is on the brink of death, you may discard a [VINTAGE]; this is treated as that hero playing a WINE.

Title: Marquis of the Stone City
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Mounted Archer: Once during your main phase, you may discard a card from your hand or equipment zone; if you do, you ignore attack range requirements end of turn. If the discarded card is an equipment card, you may discard a card from another target hero's hand or equipment zone.
Problem Solve: (Limited Ability) During your main phase, you may choose a target hero. All heroes that that have the target hero within attack range must choose to: 1. Discard a weapon card. 2. Allow target hero to draw a card.

Title: The Nightmare of Ace
Health/Gender:4M
Ability:
Seize Weapon: Whenever you are dealt damage by an ATTACK, you may discard a card from your hand or equipment zone. If you do, take the weapon from the equipment zone of the source of damage into your hand.
Backstab: (Passive) Whenever you have dealt damage to a target hero with an ATTACK, if you are not within his attack range, this ATTACK deals an 1 additional damage.

Title: The Unrestrained and Honest Advisor
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Seek Knowledge: Whenever you discard your cards, you may put any number of them on top of the deck.
Blunt words: At the end of your turn, you may target a hero. That hero draws a card and reveals it. If that card is an equipment card, that hero must play that equipment card and then gain 1 health. (The equipment card replaces any previous equipment that shared the same slot.)

Title: The Patient Commander
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Courage: During your main phase, you may discard X cards and choose another target hero within your attack range. (X is the number of times you activate [COURAGE] during this turn, the first time you activate [COURAGE] is treated as 1.) If X is: 1: You discard a card from target hero's hand, equipment or judgment zone. 2: Target hero gives you a card from their hand, equipment or judgment zone. 3: You deal 1 damage to target hero. 4+: You and target hero draw 2 cards.

Title: Henchwoman
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Slander: Once during your main phase, whenever you play an ATTACK or BLACK non-delay tactics card targeting a single hero, you may choose a second hero who can also be targeted by your card. The second targeted hero chooses one of the following: 1. Second target hero gives you a card and becomes the source for the card you have played. 2. Second target also becomes the additional target to the card you have played. (If the source of the ATTACK changes for you, you are considered to not yet have played an ATTACK this turn.)
Arrogant: Whenever you are dealt damage by a male hero, you may discard an equipment card and reduce that damage by 1.

Title: Defender of Chung Chou
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Feint: At the end of your turn, you may have target hero discard a card from your hand or equipment zone, if the discarded card is not an ATTACK card, you may take a card from his hand, equipment or judgment zone into your hand.

Title: Wu's Prime Minister
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Prudent: During your main phase, you may discard 2 cards from your hand or equipment zone. If you do, draw a card.
In the same spirit: At the end of your turn, you may reveal your hand. If all the revealed cards are the same color, you may choose X heroes to draw a card. (X is the number of cards in your hand.)

Title: General of National Stability
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Stabilize the country: Once during your main phase, you may choose a target hero and put an equipment from their equipment zone back into their hand. If that hero's attack range was reduced because of this effect, you draw a card.

Title: The Greedy Noble
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Seeking Fame: Once during each hero's turn, whenever you have dealt or was dealt damage, you may choose one of the following: 1. Discard a card from target hero's hand. That hero must have more cards in their hand than you. 2. Target hero draws a card. That hero must have less cards in hand than you.

Title: The Talented and Virtuous Crowned Prince
Health/Gender:4M
Ability:
Rectify: Once during your main phase, you may target another hero. That hero may attach up to 3 cards (At least 1.) from his hand or equipment zone onto your hero face down as [RECTIFICATION]. If he does, at the beginning of your next turn, you take all [RECTIFICATION] cards attached to you into your hand and the target hero draws the amount of [RECTIFICATON] cards you have recieved.

Title: The Eunuch Who Ordered National Isolation
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Extravagant: During your main phase, if your hand limit is greater than 0, you may draw a card then reduce your hand limit by 1 until the end of your turn. At the end of your turn, if you have no cards in your hand, you may choose up to X target heros to be chained. (X is your current health)
Chain of Disasters: Whenever you are dealt fire damage, if your hero card is chained and you are the first hero among the chained heroes to receive the damage, this damage is increased by 1

Title: The Beautiful Empress of Justice
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Ask for Divinatory Diagram: Once during each hero's main phase, the active hero may give you a card and you decide to place it on top or bottom of the library. If you do, both you and the active hero draws a card from the opposite side of the library. (If the active hero is you, you don't have to reveal the card and you are only allowed to draw 1 card.)
Execution: At the end of a male hero's turn, if the remaining number of cards in the library is less than or equal to X (X is your current health x 10), then you can play all ATTACK cards from the library on that male hero ignoring any range requirements, then shuffle the deck. (The number of ATTACK cards that can be played cannot exceed the number of surviving heroes)

Title: The Elegantly Simple Minister
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Recovery: When another target hero plays a card in response to a card you have played, you may give the card you played to that hero and take the card that hero played into your hand. (That hero cannot play the given card this turn.)
(Upgrade) When another target hero plays a card in response to a card you have played, you may take the card that hero played into your hand.
Training: At the end of your turn, you may have target hero draw as many cards as there are DIAMOND suited cards on the field. Then that hero discards X cards. If they have discarded all their cards, you can upgrade [RECOVERY] and lose the [TRAINING] ability for the rest of the game.
